I am ...

I am Rohit, currently working as a Research Engineer at INRIA in France. I have experience in developing for the web, mobile and cloud based distributed applications. I also have experience in developement of scalable storage for big data and parallel numerical simulations using MPI libraries. I have developed in Java, Ruby, Python, JavaScript, C++, Bash and Fortran.

I consider myself as language and technology agnostic. I could be contacted via email.
